JFiles.service.Game

Class GamePool

  • java.lang.Object
    • JFiles.service.Game.GamePool

  • @Service(value="GamePool")
public class GamePool
extends java.lang.Object
    Players looking for game or already playing are registered here
    It generates game session for player pair or add player to looking for game queue

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<GameSession> gameSessions 
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> lookingForGame 
      private StatisticService statisticService 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GamePool() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void addToLookingForGameList(java.lang.String userName) 
      private void createNewGameSession(java.lang.String player1, java.lang.String player2)
      Method creates new GameSession, add it to pool of GameSessions and
      remove players from lookingForGame queue
      private java.lang.String findPair(java.lang.String userName)
      Method just gets first name from lookingForGame queue
      GameSession getGame(java.lang.String userName)
      Return existing GameSession for userName
      If there is no GameSession add user to queue of players looking for game and
      try to find second player.
      private GameSession getGameSession(java.lang.String userName)
      Return link to GameSession where player1 or player2 name is equal to userName
      private java.lang.Boolean isGameSessionExist(java.lang.String userName)
      Check is there game session with for the userName
      Returns true if player1 or player2 name is equal to userName
      private java.lang.Boolean isUserInLookingForGameList(java.lang.String userName) 
      void removeUser(java.lang.String userName)
      Remove userName from GameSession instance, so it become not accessible via getGame
      If both players have been removed - GameSession instance removed as well
      Note: GameSession should be removed from server only when both players are decided to leave game, otherwise when one player leave the game other one leaves as well
      void setStatisticService(StatisticService statisticService)

    • Constructor Detail

      • GamePool

        public GamePool()

    • Method Detail

      • getGame

        public GameSession getGame(java.lang.String userName)
        Return existing GameSession for userName
        If there is no GameSession add user to queue of players looking for game and
        try to find second player. In case of success creates new GameSession

      • removeUser

        public void removeUser(java.lang.String userName)
        Remove userName from GameSession instance, so it become not accessible via getGame
        If both players have been removed - GameSession instance removed as well
        Note: GameSession should be removed from server only when both players are decided to leave game, otherwise when one player leave the game other one leaves as well

      • isGameSessionExist

        private java.lang.Boolean isGameSessionExist(java.lang.String userName)
        Check is there game session with for the userName
        Returns true if player1 or player2 name is equal to userName

      • getGameSession

        private GameSession getGameSession(java.lang.String userName)
        Return link to GameSession where player1 or player2 name is equal to userName

      • isUserInLookingForGameList

        private java.lang.Boolean isUserInLookingForGameList(java.lang.String userName)

      • addToLookingForGameList

        private void addToLookingForGameList(java.lang.String userName)

      • findPair

        private java.lang.String findPair(java.lang.String userName)
        Method just gets first name from lookingForGame queue

      • createNewGameSession

        private void createNewGameSession(java.lang.String player1,
                                  java.lang.String player2)
        Method creates new GameSession, add it to pool of GameSessions and
        remove players from lookingForGame queue

      • setStatisticService

        @Autowired
 @Qualifier(value="StatisticServiceBean")
public void setStatisticService(StatisticService statisticService)
